CustomField.formula: TEXT(YEAR(Leave_Start_Date__c)) & LPAD(TEXT(MONTH (Leave_Start_Date__c)),2,"0")& LPAD(TEXT(DAY (Leave_Start_Date__c)),2,"0") & "/" & TEXT(YEAR(Leave_End_Date__c + 1)) & LPAD(TEXT(MONTH (Leave_End_Date__c + 1)),2,"0")& LPAD(TEXT(DAY (Leave_End_Date__c + 1)),2,"0")
CustomField.label: StartEndDate
